items.title: Supreme Court dismisses Bharti Airtel subsidiary’s appeal against entertainment tax on DTH services
items.description: In its judgement dated May 22, 2025, the Supreme Court dismissed the appeals filed by Bharti Telemedia Limited.

items.title: Coal ministry surpasses asset monetisation target by Rs 63,000 crore
items.description: The record numbers indicate renewed confidence in the coal sector as the Indian government seeks to ensure energy security for the country through thermal power till the time firm renewable energy becomes affordable.

items.title: Waaree Energies shares fall 8 percent as Trump's tax cut aims to end key renewable subsidies
items.description: Trump's 'big, beautiful bill' proposes to repeal grants for reduce air pollution and greenhouse gas emissions or purchase electric commercial vehicles, as well as removal of 30% tax credit for installing solar rooftop systems.

items.title: LTTS: Muted results in Q4, recovery building this fiscal
items.description: Execution softness offset by strong deal wins and stable outlook

items.title: Weekly Tactical Pick – Is this the right drink for investors?
items.description: Strong execution, backed by domestic demand & expanding geographical footprint

items.title: ITC Q4 FY25 numbers beat muted demand, cost headwinds
items.description: Newly added high-growth businesses will create a future-ready portfolio

items.title: Sun Pharma sees mid-to-high single-digit growth in FY26, bets big on specialty expansion
items.description: The company also expects R&D spending to rise to 6–8% of sales, reflecting its commitment to pipeline expansion and innovation.

items.title: Business in the Week Ahead: May 26-30, 2025
items.description: India and US GDP, US Fed meeting minutes, US inflation are key data points to track. Four new IPOs will open for subscription
